attributes.action: Let NHS workers that are working have a Christmas Day on a different day!
attributes.additional_details: This should mean that they can choose a day between 22-27th of December to have a day when they can mix with 2 other households and celebrate Christmas!
attributes.background: I would like the government to allow NHS workers that are working on Christmas Day to be able to choose another day over the Christmas period to spend a day with their family!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564244
